overview: This file controls which monsters are preloaded in a preset, based on the Act number

data_fields.name: Act
data_fields.description: Defines the Act number used for each Monster Preset. Uses values between 1 to 5.

data_fields.name: Place
data_fields.description: Defines either a Super Unique monster from superuniques.txt, or a monster from monstats.txt, or a place from monplace.txt. This defines the Monster Preset which is used for preloading, such as during level transitions
